title: Apple Maps expands detailed 3D buildings and enhanced navigation to Canada
content:
Apple on Thursday announced that it is bringing the new Apple Maps experience with detailed 3D buildings and enhanced navigation to Canada. The new maps, which were built from scratch, will be available in selected Canadian cities.

moreâ€¦

The post Apple Maps expands detailed 3D buildings and enhanced navigation to Canada appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple is now bringing the new Apple Maps experience with detailed 3D buildings and enhanced navigation to Canada.
